Name: Notice of permanent parking restriction changes.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notice of permanent parking restriction changes.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Attachments.Name: October 15, 2015 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files

Summary: This bill would require the Department of Transportation to mail a notice to the corporate office of the owner or manager of any building that contains one or more residences and is located within 500 feet of the affected area at least fifteen days prior to a permanent parking restriction change.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      
      Section 1.  Section 19-175.2 of subchapter 2 of chapter one of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to by adding a new subdivision f to read as follows: 
            f. Not less than fifteen days prior to a permanent change in parking restrictions the department shall mail a notice to the corporate office of the owner or manager of any building that contains one or more residences, and that is located within 500 feet of any part of the affected area, indicating the effective date of such change. 
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect 60 days after it becomes law.



KW
LS 5723
8/25/15
